name: The Young Inquisitor - Demo
description:
DISCLAIMER: This is more of an interactive book than it is a game due to the imbalance between my ideas and my programming skills. (It's in the game section because it reads user input so there's that)

R to reset. --- When you run out of choices, it simply stops responding to any input. I find it useless to implement a game-over screen while you're not able to determine a particular cause.  And "Game over - out of options" is just weird.

It's an alternate historical scenario, taking place during the Spanish Inquisition.

Any kind of feedback is welcome. I'll take into account every suggestion (Even those who tell me to kms).
